avdta.network.node

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Location
      • avdta.network.node.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Node>, ICoordinate, MapMarker, MapObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Intersection, Zone

    public abstract class Node
extends Location
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Node>, MapMarker
    An abstract node in the traffic network. Nodes can be Intersections or Zones.
    CR stands for conflict regions.
    SIGNALS whether an intersection has signal or not.
    IP integer program.
    MCKS heuristic for IP; multiple constrained knapsack problem.
    STOP for stop sign.
    incoming and outgoing for a set of incoming Links and outgoing Links.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public abstract boolean canMove(Link i,
                                Link j,
                                DriverType driver)
        Parameters:

        j - An outgoing Link from the intersection.
        driver - For knowing the DriverType.
        Returns:
